thread.title: Bob Barker taken to hospital after falling near his home
thread.title_full: Bob Barker taken to hospital after falling near his home - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Bob Barker taken to hospital after falling near his home
text:
By Liz Raftery, Bob Barker was hospitalized Tuesday after he tripped and fell while taking a walk near his home in the Hollywood Hills, TMZ reports.
The former Price Is Right host was out for his daily stroll around 10:30 a.m.when he stumbled in front of a pair of LAPD policemen who were responding to a call in the neighborhood. The cops provided first aid until paramedics arrived.
Barker, 91, was taken to Cedars-Sinai medical center to treat a knee injury and a cut on his forehead. He was released later that day, according to TMZ.
"He works out every day and is disappointed that he'll have to take a little break until he heals," Barker's rep told Entertainment Tonight .
View the original article on TVGuide.com
